title: Madrigales and ayres Of two, three, foure and fiue voyces, with the continued base, with toccatos, sinfonias and rittornellos to them. After the manner of consort musique. To be performed with the harpesechord, lutes, theorbos, base violl, two violins, or two viols. Published by Walter Porter, one of the gentlemen of his Maiesties royall chappell.
author: Porter, Walter, d. 1659.
